foods.description: HAND TOSSED PIZZA
foods.lowercaseDescription: hand tossed pizza
foods.ingredients: CRUST (ENRICHED FLOUR [WHEAT FLOUR, NIACIN, REDUCED IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID], WATER, YEAST, SOYBEAN OIL, SALT, ASCORBIC ACID), LOW-MOISTURE PART-SKIM MOZZARELLA CHEESE (PART-SKIM MILK, CHEESE CULTURE, SALT, ENZYMES), TOMATOES, PEPPERONI WITH SMOKE FLAVOR ADDED (PORK, BEEF, SALT, CONTAINS 2% OR LESS OF: SPICES, DEXTROSE, PAPRIKA, LACTIC ACID STARTER CULTURE, OLEORESIN OF PAPRIKA, SODIUM ASCORBATE, FLAVORING, SMOKE FLAVORING, SODIUM NITRITE, BHA, BHT, CITRIC ACID), GREEN BELL PEPPERS, MUSHROOMS, TOMATO JUICE, COOKED ITALIAN SAUSAGE (PORK, WATER, SPICES, SALT, SUGAR, FLAVORINGS, BHA, BHT, CITRIC ACID), TOMATO PASTE, BLACK OLIVES, CARAMELIZED ONIONS (ONIONS, DRIED CANE SYRUP, CARAMEL COLOR, NATURAL FLAVOR), CONTAINS 2% OR LESS OF PARMESAN, ASIAGO, AND ROMANO CHEESES MADE FROM COW'S MILK ([PART-SKIM MILK, CHEESE CULTURE, SALT, ENZYMES], CELLULOSE POWDER TO PREVENT CAKING), WATER, SUGAR, OLIVE OIL, GARLIC, SOYBEAN OIL, SALT, SPICE, CITRIC ACID, MARJORAM, SODIUM CITRATE, XANTHAN GUM, FLAVOR
